A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created an account just so I could rate this movie. To say I disliked it is an understatement. I gave it one and a half Stars just because the title of the movie is Star Wars. What they did with Luke's character is unforgivable. His big accomplishment was providing a distraction. I like the way Chris Pratt did it in Guardians of the Galaxy much better (dance off). At least after he was done he kicked some butt instead of dying from exhaustion.
